title: Contributor Code of Conduct
text: contributors maintainers project, pledge respect people contribute reporting issues, posting feature requests, updating documentation, submitting pull requests patches, activities. committed making participation project harassment-free experience everyone, regardless level experience, gender, gender identity expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion. Examples unacceptable behavior participants include use sexual language imagery, derogatory comments personal attacks, trolling, public private harassment, insults, unprofessional conduct. Project maintainers right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct. Project maintainers follow Code Conduct may removed project team. Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported opening issue contacting one project maintainers. Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant (https://www.contributor-covenant.org), version 1.0.0, available https://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/0/0/.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Athanasia Mo Mowinckel. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Mowinckel (2026). ggsegShen: Shen 268 Functional Parcellation 'ggseg' Ecosystem. R package version 1.0.0, https://github.com/ggseg/ggsegShen.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ggsegShen: Shen 268 Functional Parcellation for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem},   author = {Athanasia Mo Mowinckel},   year = {2026},   note = {R package version 1.0.0},   url = {https://github.com/ggseg/ggsegShen}, }

what: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegShen
title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegShen
text: ggseg 2.0 atlas package providing brain atlas data ggseg ecosystem. data-package custom functions.

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegShen
text: data/*.rda — Unified ggseg_atlas objects (2D + 3D one object) R/data.R — Roxygen2 documentation atlas R/ggsegShen-package.R — Package-level docs, imports ggseg.formats data-raw/ — Scripts generated/converted atlas data

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegShen
text: package depends ggseg.formats provides ggseg_atlas class. atlas objects work ggseg::geom_brain() (2D) ggseg3d::ggseg3d() (3D).

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegShen
text: Update docs: devtools::document() Run tests: devtools::test() (testthat edition 3, describe/style) Full check: devtools::check() Build pkgdown site: pkgdown::build_site()

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegShen
text: code comments except necessary workarounds Roxygen2 markdown enabled Tests use describe/BDD style vdiffr visual regression NEWS.md tracks user-facing changes (CI/pkgdown changes) URLs point ggseg GitHub org (LCBC-UiO)

what: Shen 268 Functional Parcellation for the ggseg Ecosystem
title: Shen 268 Functional Parcellation for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: Shen 268-parcel functional brain parcellation ggseg ecosystem. Provides unified ggseg_atlas object 2D polygon geometry 3D meshes derived Shen whole-brain parcellation 268 functional nodes. Shen X et al. (2013) NeuroImage, 82:403-415 pubmed

title: Shen 268 Functional Parcellation for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: recommend installing ggseg-atlases ggseg r-universe: can install development version GitHub :
code: # Enable this universe options(repos = c(     ggseg = 'https://ggseg.r-universe.dev',     CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))  # Install some packages install.packages('ggsegShen') # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("ggseg/ggsegShen")

title: Shen 268 Functional Parcellation for the ggseg Ecosystem
code: library(ggsegShen) library(ggseg) library(ggplot2)  ggplot() +   geom_brain(atlas = shen268)

title: Shen 268 Functional Parcellation for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: volumetric parcellation file (shen_2mm_268_parcellation.nii.gz) data-raw/ downloaded NeuroVault collection 2489: Shen 268-parcel functional parcellation derived resting-state fMRI data, covering whole brain including cortical, subcortical, cerebellar regions. Reference: Shen X, Tokoglu F, Papademetris X, Constable RT (2013) Groupwise whole-brain parcellation resting-state fMRI data network node identification. NeuroImage, 82, 403-415. doi:[10.1016/j.neuroimage.2013.05.081](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.neuroimage.2013.05.081) Please note ‘ggsegShen’ project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project, agree abide terms.

what: ggsegShen: Shen 268 Functional Parcellation for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegShen-package
title: ggsegShen: Shen 268 Functional Parcellation for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegShen-package
text: Shen whole-brain parcellation 268 functional nodes 'ggseg' ecosystem. Provides unified 'ggseg_atlas' object 2D polygon geometry 3D vertex indices, use 'ggseg' 'ggseg3d'.

title: ggsegShen: Shen 268 Functional Parcellation for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegShen-package
text: Maintainer: Athanasia Mo Mowinckel .m.mowinckel@psykologi.uio.(ORCID)

title: Shen 268 Cortical Parcellation — shen268_cortical
text: Cortical regions Shen 268-node functional parcellation (Shen et al., 2013). Contains 2D polygon geometry ggseg::geom_brain() 3D vertex indices ggseg3d::ggseg3d().

title: Shen 268 Cortical Parcellation — shen268_cortical
text: ggseg.formats::ggseg_atlas object (cortical).

title: Shen 268 Cortical Parcellation — shen268_cortical
text: Shen X et al. (2013). Groupwise whole-brain parcellation resting-state fMRI data network node identification. doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2013.05.081

title: Shen 268 Subcortical Parcellation — shen268_subcortical
text: Subcortical regions Shen 268-node functional parcellation (Shen et al., 2013). Contains 2D polygon geometry 3D meshes.

title: Shen 268 Subcortical Parcellation — shen268_subcortical
text: ggseg.formats::ggseg_atlas object (subcortical).

title: Shen 268 Subcortical Parcellation — shen268_subcortical
text: Shen X et al. (2013). Groupwise whole-brain parcellation resting-state fMRI data network node identification. doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2013.05.081

title: Shen 268 Subcortical Parcellation — shen268_subcortical
code: data(shen268_subcortical) shen268_subcortical #>  #> ── shen268_subcortical ggseg atlas ───────────────────────────────────────────── #> Type: subcortical #> Regions: 16 #> Hemispheres: NA #> Views: axial_1, axial_2, axial_3, coronal_1, coronal_2, sagittal #> Palette: ✔ #> Rendering: ✔ ggseg #> ✔ ggseg3d (meshes) #> ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> # A tibble: 16 × 3 #>    hemi  region    label      #>    <chr> <chr>     <chr>      #>  1 NA    egion 058 Region_058 #>  2 NA    egion 087 Region_087 #>  3 NA    egion 088 Region_088 #>  4 NA    egion 119 Region_119 #>  5 NA    egion 121 Region_121 #>  6 NA    egion 122 Region_122 #>  7 NA    egion 123 Region_123 #>  8 NA    egion 124 Region_124 #>  9 NA    egion 127 Region_127 #> 10 NA    egion 132 Region_132 #> 11 NA    egion 135 Region_135 #> 12 NA    egion 136 Region_136 #> 13 NA    egion 229 Region_229 #> 14 NA    egion 244 Region_244 #> 15 NA    egion 245 Region_245 #> 16 NA    egion 254 Region_254

title: ggsegShen 1.0.0
text: Initial release shen268_cortical shen268_subcortical atlases unified ggseg_atlas objects ggseg 2.0 ecosystem.
